LSafe URL Security Scanner

Description:
LSafe is a professional, privacy-first web app that performs instant URL safety analysis. It uses a multi-layered approach to evaluate links for malware, phishing, scam, and spam signals.

Target Users:
- Developers verifying embedded URLs
- Email users checking suspicious links
- Security teams doing quick risk assessments
- Everyday users browsing safely

Features:
- Real-time risk scoring (0-100)
- Known malware and phishing domain checks
- Suspicious pattern detection
- HTTPS and certificate checks
- Redirect chain analysis
- Privacy guaranteed with no URL logging
- Progressive Web App with offline support

Technology:
- React (TypeScript) with Tailwind CSS frontend
- Node.js + Express backend (optional)
- Integrations planned with VirusTotal, Google Safe Browsing
- Service Worker for offline use and caching

SEO Keywords:
URL safety checker, is this link safe, phishing detection, malware scanning, URL reputation, safe browsing, LSafe, link analyzer
